determine_if_tachy module¶

determine_if_tachy.determine_if_tachy(age, HR)¶

Determine if patient is tachycardic

Parameters:
  • age (float) – age of patient
  • HR (float) – HR of patient
Returns:

connditional if tachy or not
Return type:

a
Raises:

ValueError – patient younger than 2 months

HR Sentinel
